<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AcmpcaMetricName">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="crlGenerated">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-awsx/blob/43b8dabc0ec1e5187bf63e107bf06ee54021a1a7/sdk/nodejs/classic/acmpca/metrics.ts#L40">function <b>crlGenerated</b></a>
</h4>


<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>crlGenerated(change?: cloudwatch.MetricChange): <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/awsx/classic/cloudwatch/#Metric'>Metric</a></code></pre>


A certificate revocation list (CRL) was generated. This metric applies only to a private CA.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="failure">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-awsx/blob/43b8dabc0ec1e5187bf63e107bf06ee54021a1a7/sdk/nodejs/classic/acmpca/metrics.ts#L72">function <b>failure</b></a>
</h4>


<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>failure(change?: cloudwatch.MetricChange): <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/awsx/classic/cloudwatch/#Metric'>Metric</a></code></pre>


Indicates that an operation failed. This metric applies only to the IssueCertificate operation.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="metric">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-awsx/blob/43b8dabc0ec1e5187bf63e107bf06ee54021a1a7/sdk/nodejs/classic/acmpca/metrics.ts#L29">function <b>metric</b></a>
</h4>


<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>metric(metricName: <a href='#AcmpcaMetricName'>AcmpcaMetricName</a>, change: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/awsx/classic/cloudwatch/#MetricChange'>MetricChange</a>): <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/awsx/classic/cloudwatch/#Metric'>Metric</a></code></pre>


Creates an AWS/ACMPrivateCA metric with the requested [metricName]. See
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/acm-pca/latest/userguide/PcaCloudWatch.html for list of all
metric-names.

Note, individual metrics can easily be obtained without supplying the name using the other
[metricXXX] functions.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="misconfiguredCRLBucket">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-awsx/blob/43b8dabc0ec1e5187bf63e107bf06ee54021a1a7/sdk/nodejs/classic/acmpca/metrics.ts#L48">function <b>misconfiguredCRLBucket</b></a>
</h4>


<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>misconfiguredCRLBucket(change?: cloudwatch.MetricChange): <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/awsx/classic/cloudwatch/#Metric'>Metric</a></code></pre>


The S3 bucket specified for the CRL is not correctly configured. Check the bucket policy. This
metric applies only to a private CA.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="success">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-awsx/blob/43b8dabc0ec1e5187bf63e107bf06ee54021a1a7/sdk/nodejs/classic/acmpca/metrics.ts#L65">function <b>success</b></a>
</h4>


<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>success(change?: cloudwatch.MetricChange): <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/awsx/classic/cloudwatch/#Metric'>Metric</a></code></pre>


Specifies whether a certificate was successfully issued. This metric applies only to the
IssueCertificate operation.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="time">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-awsx/blob/43b8dabc0ec1e5187bf63e107bf06ee54021a1a7/sdk/nodejs/classic/acmpca/metrics.ts#L57">function <b>time</b></a>
</h4>


<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>time(change?: cloudwatch.MetricChange): <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/awsx/classic/cloudwatch/#Metric'>Metric</a></code></pre>


The time at which the certificate was issued. This metric applies only to the
[IssueCertificate](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/acm-pca/latest/APIReference/API_IssueCertificate.html)
operation.
